#How to use

= Introduction =

How to use this firejspt


= Details =

1. You must get it in your page :
<script type="text/javascript" src="firejspt.js"  ></script>

2. If you have a function like this:

  function testFun(){
     for (var i=0;i<500;i++){
	   $("#test").html("Hello World");
	 }	 
  }


  you can test the function's Performance with:

   *jspt.test(function(){testFun();}); *
